Package it.uniba.command

Class Command

java.lang.Object
it.uniba.command.Command
public class Command
extends java.lang.Object
This is the class of command
Responsibility
This class can:
- show application menu
- show command list
- ask for commands
This class know:
- "Chessboard" class methods
- "History" class methods
This class is " boundary ".
